question:
Which of the following was/ were the reasons for the Maratha defeat in the third battle of Panipat?
1. The force of Ahmad Shah Abdali was skillful than the Marathas
2. Right before the battle, Marathas faced severe starving
3. The leadership of Sadashiva Bhau was inferior to the leadership of Abdali
4. The force of Abdali was better armed than the Marathas
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: The reasons for the Maratha defeat in the third battle of Panipat- The force of Ahmad Shah Abdali was skillful than the Marathas by all means. Marathas faced severe starving two months before the battle. The leadership of Sadashiva Bhau was inferior to the leadership of Abdali. The force of Abdali was better armed than the Marathas. Many historians depicted different reasons in different aspects.
